joinNowPage.title: JOIN NOW
joinNowPage.subTitle: MyACUVUE™
joinNowPage.TermsAndConditions.iHaveRead: I have read and accepted the Terms & Conditions.
joinNowPage.body.paragraph1: Enjoy exclusive offers by earning points every time you purchase ACUVUE® Brand Contact Lenses.
joinNowPage.body.paragraph2.first: Join now to enjoy up to
aboutPointsPage.pointsDescription.body: “MyACUVUE™ Point” is a point collection privilege given to ACUVUE® Consumer who purchase on ACUVUE® products or take actions set by ACUVUE®.​
aboutPointsPage.pointsDescription.point2: Simply make a purchase on ACUVUE® contact lenses at your optical store or ACUVUE® TO HOME to collect MyACUVUE™ points.
pointsTermsAndCondition.title: Terms & Conditions
pointsTermsandCondition.info: Johnson & Johnson collects your personal data to enable us to include you in our Loyalty Membership Program and create relevant experiences and offers to you. We process personal data in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
rewardsPage.couponDetails.eligibleForSto: Valid for using at your optical store
membershipPage.platinumView.giftDescript: Welcome you with an exclusive gift.
membershipPage.platinumView.platinumBirt: Enjoy unlimited 3X MyACUVUE™ Points for every purchase on ACUVUE® contact lenses on your birth month.
membershipPage.memberView.memberBirthday: Enjoy unlimited 2X MyACUVUE™ Points for every purchase on ACUVUE® contact lenses on your birth month
membershipPage.memberView.memberPurchase: Earn MyACUVUE™ Points for every purchase
Earn MyACUVUE™ Points when you purchase ACUVUE® contact lenses.
membershipPage.memberView.memberRedeemDe: Redeem your MyACUVUE™ Points for ACUVUE® cash coupons and other rewards from participating shops.
membershipPage.memberView.memberCompleme: We offer a complimentary eye test by an eye care professional at your optical store.
Try ACUVUE® contact lenses for free at your optical store.
membershipPage.memberView.memberSpecialM: Special member-only offers and privileges from ACUVUE® and participating optical stores
Access to other special offers and privileges available only to MyACUVUE™ members.
dashboardPage.membershipDetails.benefits: Enjoy 2x points on your birthday month
dashboardPage.membershipDetails.navigate: MyACUVUE™ mobile app is required to collect points and redeem rewards. Scroll down for a QR code linking you to the free app.
dashboardPage.rewardWallet.empty.redeemR: You don't have any rewards at the moment. Redeem rewards from 1,000 points and look out for exclusive offers from us! Start collecting points now with every purchase you make on MyACUVUE™ App.
dashboardPage.opticalStore.confirmationD: Purchase your ACUVUE® contact lenses at this store and start collecting points with every purchase.Would you like to register this as your preferred store?
dashboardPage.opticalStore.registerPrefe: Start collecting points every time you purchase ACUVUE® contact lenses from your participating Optical Store.
dashboardPage.invitation.title: Enjoy more with MyACUVUE™ App! Redeem your points for rewards, unlock more exclusive benefits at anytime.
dashboardPage.invitation.appExclusiveOff: Visit the app for exclusive promo codes and reward redemption.
dashboardPage.invitation.itsEasyBody: Manage your eye care consultation with your registered optical store in just a few clicks
dashboardPage.invitation.contactLensesBo: Receive important product news and latest promotions
dashboardPage.invitation.contactLensTips: Get the most from your contact lenses by accessing tips and tricks in Eye Care Center
profilePage.registrationSuccessDialogBod: Thank you for registering with MyACUVUE™ Rewards Program! Enjoy exclusive offer, rewards and more by earning points every time you purchase or replenish your MyACUVUE™ Brand Contact Lenses.
emailVerification.subTitle: MyACUVUE™
emailVerification.body.paragraph1: A verification email has been sent to your email account (${email}).
emailVerification.body.paragraph2: Kindly verify your email address by clicking on the verification link in the email
emailVerification.body.paragraph3: Didn't receive the email? Check your spam/ junk folder. If you still did not receive it, kindly contact MyACUVUE™ Support at Email: my.myacuvue@its.jnj.com Hotline : 1 800 812 482
completeYourProfileForm.form.wearingAcuv: Yes, I am currently wearing non-ACUVUE brand contact lens
completeYourProfileForm.form.wearingNonA: Yes, I am currently wearing ACUVUE brand contact lenses
